data.title: Full B Reckoning and Cascade Execute
data.description: When Reckoning is up, you can use this combination of utility to effectively force Defenders into an unfavorable position. When setting up a split towards the B Site, follow the video demonstration. If not, make sure to High Tide Market and Spawn off instead of using Cascade.

data.title: B Site Full Cascade Execute
data.description: Use High Tide to restrict visibility from outside of site all in one go as demonstrated in the video, for an efficient way of executing the B Site.

data.title: A Site Cascade Link + Spawn
data.description: Use Cascade to push back defenders, or leave them slowed for a push onto A Site.
